rooms.description: Open space with storage and a foyer leading to the main living area.
Spacious open-plan living area adjacent to dining area, designed for contemporary aesthetics.
Integrated with the living room for a seamless flow; includes bar counter and seating arrangement.
Modern kitchen with functional layout, including pantry storage, optimized ergonomics, and efficient workflows.
Corner bedroom for the head of the family following Vastu recommendations; includes built-in wardrobe.
Additional bedroom with natural light from a window positioned as per Vastu guidelines.
Dedicated office space designed for productivity; features minimalistic decor and soundproofing.
Fitness area equipped with exercise machines and sufficient space for yoga or aerobics, located in a quiet corner of the plot.
Primary bathroom placed conveniently near master bedroom; includes modern fixtures.
